info.title: HTML Content Object
info.description: Creates an html content object for async communication.

method.name: build
method.description: Build the outer html content container.

parameter.name: $id
parameter.description: The element's id.

parameter.name: $class
parameter.description: The element's class.

parameter.name: $loadHTML
parameter.description: Indicator whether to load html from the designer file.

method.name: buildElement
method.description: Build the HTMLContent element with an element that the user built.

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The user's element.

method.name: getActionFactory
method.description: Creates a new Report Factory instance.
method.returndescription: An instance of the Report Factory object.

method.name: append
method.description: Appends an element to the HTMLContent root element.

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The element to be appended.

method.returndescription: Returns NULL if the element given is empty. Returns the HTMLContent object otherwise.

parameter.name: $href
parameter.description: The weblink href attribute.

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The weblink content. It can be text or DOMElement.

parameter.name: $target
parameter.description: The target attribute. It is "_self" by default.

parameter.name: $class
parameter.description: The weblink class attribute.

method.name: addReportContent
method.description: Adds a report data content to the server report.

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The DOMElement report content.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The holder of the content. This holder will be used to append or replace (according to the third parameter) the content. It works as a css selector.

parameter.name: $method
parameter.description: The report method. See class constants.

method.name: addReportAction
method.description: Adds a report action content to the server report.

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The action event name.

parameter.name: $value
parameter.description: The action value (if any, empty by default).

method.name: addResourceHeader
method.description: Add a resource (js or css) header to the content.

parameter.name: $rsrcID
parameter.description: The resource unique id.

parameter.name: $header
parameter.description: The resource parameters.

method.name: getReport
method.description: Returns the HTML Report for this html content.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The holder to get the content.

parameter.name: $method
parameter.description: The report method. See class constants.

method.name: getNavigationGroup
method.description: Gets a DOMElement with a navigation group attribute.

parameter.name: $id
parameter.description: The element id.

parameter.name: $groupSelector
parameter.description: The navigation group selector.

method.name: setNavigationGroup
method.description: Sets a navigation group attribute to a given nav group container.

parameter.name: $navGroup
parameter.description: The navigation group DOMElement.

parameter.name: $groupSelector
parameter.description: The navigation group selector.

method.name: setStaticNav
method.description: Set a navigation handler (static = javascript only) to an element.

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The element to receive the navigation handler.

parameter.name: $ref
parameter.description: The target's id to perform the action. The target will be shown.

parameter.name: $targetcontainer
parameter.description: The container's id of the group in which the target resides

parameter.name: $targetgroup
parameter.description: The group of the items to handle together when performing the action to the target. Set with setNavigationGroup();

parameter.name: $navgroup
parameter.description: The group of navigation items, among which the handler element will be selected.

parameter.name: $display
parameter.description: Defines the type of action for the rest items of the group. Accepted values: - "none" : hides all other items - "all" : shows all other items - "toggle" : toggles the appearance of the handler item.

method.name: loadHTML
method.description: Loads the html content of the php file.

method.name: loadLiterals
method.description: Loads the literals inside the html.

method.name: resolveUrls
method.description: Resolves all data-href attributes to href attributes with a resolved url.
